turnStructure.desc: Players select char cards to deploy.
Players choose act cards or attack.

rules: If a player's battle zone is empty, they may play any card from their hand.
If a player's battle zone is not empty, a new card can only be played if it shares an element or class with at least one card in the battle zone.
Only one god, one element, and one class card can be in the battle zone at a time.
If a player cannot play a card, they must discard one instead.
Healing cards can target other cards in your battle zone.
Each turn ends with an attack phase where all cards in the battle zone attack their chosen targets.
If a card reaches 0 hp, it is discarded permanently and added to the player's discard pile.
The game continues until one player has no cards left in their deck or hand.

attackRules.targetSelection: Players select targets for their attacking cards.
attackRules.attackPriority: Characters attack first, then action cards.
attackRules.attackOrder: Highest spd attacks first. If tied, attacker goes first.

cardDestructionRules.effect: If hp reaches threshold, card is removed from the battle zone and added to the player's discard pile.
revivalConditions: Only cards with a valid revival effect can be revived.
Revived cards return with 50% hp unless specified otherwise by the revival effect.
A revived card cannot act until the next turn after revival.
